data.text:
This Page is a list of Thunderbirds films.

Movies[]

Logo Name Director Release Date Thunderbirds Are Go David Lane 12/12/66 Thunderbird 6 David Lane 29/7/68 Thunderbirds

Jonathan Frakes

23/7/04

Made-for-TV Movies[]

In 1980, 1981 and 1982, most of Anderson's TV shows were being re-edited into multi episode TV Movies by Super Space Theater. This resulted in three Thunderbirds movies.

Logo Name Episodes Used Aired

Thunderbirds To The Rescue

Trapped in the Sky

Operation Crash-Dive

1980

Thunderbirds In Outer Space

Sun Probe

Ricochet

1981

Countdown To Disaster

Terror in New York City

Atlantic Inferno

1982

After their original airing they were never broadcast again. However, they were released on VHS several times during the 80's and 90's in the UK (as volumes 1, 2, and 3 of the entire series VHS release). These also ended up creating a rights issue for the episodes meaning that these compilation films were the only form of the original episodes that could be released on VHS until the mid 90's. It wasn't until Carlton released the series in 2000 that the original episodes in their uncut form were released on a home video format.

See also[]
